title: U.S. states with state cyber bullying laws as of November 2018
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows State totals for 5 number of Category Of Cyber Bullying Laws.
Category Of Cyber Bullying Law School policy has the highest State totals and Includes off-campus has the lowest State totals.
There is a difference of 32.0 between the maximum Category Of Cyber Bullying Law School policy and minimum Category Of Cyber Bullying Law Includes off-campus.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Category Of Cyber Bullying Law in the x axis and State totals in the y axis.
The maximum State totals 49.0 is found at Category Of Cyber Bullying Law School policy and the minimum is found at Includes off-campus where Category Of Cyber Bullying Law is 17.0.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows State totals for 5 number of Category Of Cyber Bullying Laws.
Category Of Cyber Bullying Law School policy has the highest State totals and Includes off-campus has the lowest State totals.
There is a difference of 32.0 between the maximum Category Of Cyber Bullying Law School policy and minimum Category Of Cyber Bullying Law Includes off-campus.
max_summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Category Of Cyber Bullying Law, and State totals in each Category Of Cyber Bullying Law on the y axis.
The State totals is appeared to be the highest at Category Of Cyber Bullying Law School policy and lowest at Category Of Cyber Bullying Law Includes off-campus.
There is a difference of 32.0 between the maximum Category Of Cyber Bullying Law School policy and minimum Category Of Cyber Bullying Law Includes off-campus.

Category Of Cyber Bullying Law School policy is higher than any other Category Of Cyber Bullying Laws with value 49.0, followed by Includes cyber bullying or online harassment, and School sanction for cyber bullying. Down to Category Of Cyber Bullying Law Includes off-campus with the lowest value 17.0.
The lowest value 17.0 at Includes off-campus is almost 1.21 times smaller than the average value 40.6.
Summing up the values of all Category Of Cyber Bullying Laws, we get total 203.0.

data.Category Of Cyber Bullying Law: Includes cyber bullying or online harassment
Criminal Sanction for cyber bullying or electronic harassment
